import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { motion, useScroll, useTransform, useSpring, useInView } from "framer-motion"; import InteractiveLines from "./InteractiveLines-pro"; const OtherP: React.FC = () => { const { scrollY } = useScroll(); const scrollX = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 400], [0, -200]); const xSpring = useSpring(scrollX, { stiffness: 100, damping: 30 }); // Add ref for hero section const heroRef = useRef(null); const heroInView = useInView(heroRef, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); return (
{/* Hero Section */} {/* Interactive Background for Hero only */}
PROJECTS
A collection of my creative works spanning branding, web games, and interactive experiences   •   A collection of my creative works spanning branding, web games, and interactive experiences   •   
{/* Projects Content */}
{/* Branding Design Section */}

Branding Design

Collecting my branding design for some famous bands, such as Johnnie Walker and Havana Club. Showing my illustration and design for those brands.

I am also as an illustrator or a graphic design at the same time.

My illustration for the well-known
brand Havana Club
2023 in Shanghai, China

{/* Web Game Design Section */}

Web Game Design

"ECHO" is a web-based rhythm game created in 2024 that transforms sound into an interactive journey. Players tap, sing, or react to music cues to unlock dynamic visuals and immerse themselves in a world shaped by echoing beats.

Technologies

React Web Audio API Three.js

Features

  • Interactive sound visualization
  • Real-time rhythm detection
  • Dynamic visual effects
{/* Interactive Game Design Section */}

Interactive Game Design

An interactive adventure game where players will make choices that affect the story's outcome. Help a little turkey can perform a jump or a double jump to avoid obstacles and collect items along the way. Collecting treats and local happenings, this game combines fun and exploration.

); }; export default OtherP;
